page.title: 11Falkland's War
page.content: My brother was a corpral in the Royal Marines when he went,but now he is a sargeant.We never had a warning when he went.He sailed on H.M.S. Hermes.He stopped at the Ascension Islands and carried on to the Falklands.We were all on 'hot pins' at home.We watched every news broadcast and read every newspaper.We got all the news from Carol,my brother's wife.I made a scrap book.A long time later when it was all over we had a massive Union Jack on the side of the house.It covered the wall.We had flags and banners up and my brother brought me back an Argentinian hat,scabbard and bayonet. They were ex-American
